original_text: and the opening of the robe in it was like the opening in a garment, with a binding around the opening, so that it might not tear.
korean_text: 그 옷의 두 어깨 사이에 구멍을 내고 갑옷 깃 같이 그 구멍 주위에 깃을 짜서 찢어지지 않게 하고

sentences.original_text: and the opening of the robe in it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 안에 있는 겉옷의 테두리는

sentences.original_text: was like the opening in a garment
with a binding around the opening
so that it might not tear
